name: Hainan A330-243 [B-6088] Close Up Taxi and Takeoff from Calgary Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
Back in June when Hainan still sent the A330! Here we have B-6088, a 9-year old A330-200 taxiing close up on Bravo and departing runway 17L for Beijing. Always a pleasure to see our newest airline from such a great vantage point. ATC is included, enjoy!

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Hainan Airlines (CHH/HU)
Aircraft: Airbus A330-200
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: New
Engines: 2x RR Trent 772B-60
Registration: B-6088
Route: YYC-PEK
Callsign: Hainan 7978 heavy
Runway used: 17L
Local Time: 1530
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/B6088
